Publik Famille Demo Core

Django settings for the Publik Famille Demo project.

This file contains default project configuration including installed apps, middleware, database setup, static/media files, authentication, and project-specific parameters.

Sensitive values (e.g., secret keys, tokens) are read from environment variables when available.

Root URL configuration for the Publik Famille Demo project.

This module defines the global URL routes and delegates to application-specific urls.py modules. It also serves media files in development mode.

For more details, see: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/topics/http/urls/

publik_famille_demo.urls.urlpatterns = [<URLResolver <URLPattern list> (admin:admin) 'admin/'>, <URLResolver <module 'accounts.urls' from '/home/react/Desktop/Entrouvert/publik_famille/accounts/urls.py'> (None:None) 'accounts/'>, <URLResolver <module 'families.urls' from '/home/react/Desktop/Entrouvert/publik_famille/families/urls.py'> (families:families) 'families/'>, <URLResolver <module 'activities.urls' from '/home/react/Desktop/Entrouvert/publik_famille/activities/urls.py'> (activities:activities) 'activities/'>, <URLResolver <module 'billing.urls' from '/home/react/Desktop/Entrouvert/publik_famille/billing/urls.py'> (billing:billing) 'billing/'>, <URLResolver <module 'documents.urls' from '/home/react/Desktop/Entrouvert/publik_famille/documents/urls.py'> (documents:documents) 'documents/'>, <URLResolver <module 'monitoring.urls' from '/home/react/Desktop/Entrouvert/publik_famille/monitoring/urls.py'> (monitoring:monitoring) 'monitoring/'>, <URLPattern '' [name='home']>, <URLPattern '^media/(?P<path>.*)$'>, <URLPattern 'accounts/verify/' [name='accounts_verify_identity']>, <URLPattern 'accounts/verify/start/' [name='accounts_verify_start']>, <URLPattern 'accounts/verify/callback/' [name='accounts_verify_callback']>]

Global URL patterns for the project

WSGI config for the Publik Famille Demo project.

This module exposes the WSGI callable as a module-level variable named application. It is used by WSGI servers such as Gunicorn, uWSGI, or Django’s built-in runserver to serve the project.

For more details, see: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/howto/deployment/wsgi/

publik_famille_demo.wsgi.application = <django.core.handlers.wsgi.WSGIHandler object>

The WSGI application callable used by WSGI servers

ASGI config for the Publik Famille Demo project.

This module exposes the ASGI callable as a module-level variable named application. It is used by ASGI servers such as Daphne, Uvicorn, or Hypercorn to serve the project.

For more details, see: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/howto/deployment/asgi/

publik_famille_demo.asgi.application = <django.core.handlers.asgi.ASGIHandler object>

The ASGI application callable used by ASGI servers

Custom context processors for the Publik Famille Demo project.

These processors inject project-specific variables into all template contexts, making them available globally in templates.

publik_famille_demo.context_processors.branding(request)[source]

Inject branding and backend configuration into the template context.

Paramètres:

request (HttpRequest) – The current HTTP request.

Renvoie:

A dictionary containing: - EO_LOGO_URL : URL for Entr’ouvert logo, or None if unset. - PUBLIK_LOGO_URL : URL for Publik logo, or None if unset. - BILLING_BACKEND : Configured billing backend (default: local). - ENROLLMENT_BACKEND : Configured enrollment backend (default: local).

Type renvoyé:

dict

Notes

These values are defined in Django settings and can be customized via environment variables.
